mapper.select: SELECT O.OUT_ID , O.OUT_TYPE , O.OUT_TTL , O.OUT_VER , O.OUT_FILE , O.CRT_DT , O.CRTR_ID , O.MDF_DT , O.MDFR_ID , O.PRJ_ID , O.DEL_YN , CC.CMCD_NAME AS OUTPUT_TYPE_NAME , P.PRJ_NAME FROM PMS."OUTPUT" O JOIN COMMON_CODE cc ON O.OUT_TYPE = CC.CMCD_ID JOIN PROJECT P ON O.PRJ_ID = P.PRJ_ID WHERE O.DEL_YN='N'
SELECT count(1) AS LIST_CNT FROM "OUTPUT" WHERE DEL_YN='N'
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO PMS."OUTPUT" ( OUT_ID , OUT_TYPE , OUT_TTL , OUT_VER , OUT_FILE , CRT_DT , CRTR_ID
, PRJ_ID , DEL_YN) VALUES ( ('OUT_' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD') || '_' || LPAD(SEQ_OUTPUT_PK.NEXTVAL, 6, '0')) , #{outType} , #{outTtl} , 0 , 'ASDSDASD' , SYSDATE , '00000' , #{prjId} , 'N' )
